The book has been a **bestseller** (a very popular book that sells a lot) in the United States and has already won many awards. Many schools are now using it to start **discussions** (talks) about important topics. A film **version** (a film) of the book is being made, and many people, like me, are waiting with excitement to see what RJ Palacio writes next.
